section.subtitle: What I Offer
section.title: Services
section.description: Transforming ideas into exceptional digital experiences with precision, creativity, and technical excellence.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Crafting high-performance, scalable web applications with cutting-edge technologies. From responsive websites to complex web platforms, delivering seamless user experiences.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: Pushing boundaries with immersive 3D experiences and interactive animations. Bringing designs to life with WebGL, Three.js, and advanced motion graphics.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Designing intuitive, user-centered interfaces that blend aesthetics with functionality. Creating memorable digital experiences that users love.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: Building end-to-end solutions with modern backend architectures and databases. Seamlessly integrating frontend and backend for robust applications.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: Optimizing web performance for lightning-fast load times and smooth interactions. Implementing best practices for SEO, Core Web Vitals, and accessibility.

services.title: Technical Consulting
services.description: Providing strategic technical guidance for digital transformation. Architecture planning, technology stack selection, and scalability solutions.

cta: Ready to bring your vision to life?
